attributes.action: Stop the cancelling of elections unless a national emergency.
attributes.additional_details: Recent council elections being delayed for years, at the choice of elected officials is affront to democracy.
attributes.background: Protect democracy by ensuring all local elections are held at the allotted time, with the exception of a national emergency.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
